testsuite.name: ContactsTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #24
Test contains an illegal phone number "123+456 78912", you should print "[no number]" instead of this number
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter action (add, remove, edit, count, list, exit): > count The Phone Book has 0 records. Enter action (add, remove, edit, count, list, exit): > add Enter the name: > John1 Enter the surname: > Smith2 Enter the number: > 123+456 78912 The record added. Enter action (add, remove, edit, count, list, exit): > list 1. John1 Smith2, 123+456 78912 Enter action (add, remove, edit, count, list, exit): > exit
